entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • adding net7.0 tfm to project with handlers crashes #15314
  • ResourceDictionary get item operator weird behaviour CRITICAL #15312
  • Scroll does not work on Mac (Mac Catalyst) #15310

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Merge main #15313

Merged

  • [net7.0] [Windows] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #15250
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.3.1.3 to 1.4.0.1 #15265
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Window.WindowJava from 1.0.0.12 to 1.0.0.13 #15269
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.5.0.1 to 1.5.0.2 #15259
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] [Android] Disable caching when loading images from streams #15274
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Improved WebUtils.ParseQueryString() #15245
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.SwipeRefreshLayout from 1.1.0.12 to 1.1.0.13 #15266
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.6.1.1 to 2.6.1.2 #15267
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.9.0 to 1.9.0.1 #15270
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15235
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.6.1.1 to 1.6.1.2 #15263
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.3.0.1 to 1.3.0.2 #15272
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Palette from 1.0.0.17 to 1.0.0.18 #15268
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Set DOTNET_gcServer #15300

Updated

  • Fix issue with CollectionView ignoring margins for content #15246
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.5.0 to 4.6.0 #15133
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add UITest Gallery and some simple tests #15191
    area/testing
  • [net7.0] Fix e-mail URI escaping recipients #15244
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [ios] fix memory leaks in ContentView #15193
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Legacy gallery filtered solutions #15219
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Set Version for Windows #15238
    backport/suggested
  • [net7.0] Set Version for Windows #15240
  • Update cake scripts #15277
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3.2 to 2.5.3.3 #15260
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
